column5: Hello, Has anyone ever fished Bennett Lake Lodge? It is about 220 miles North of Winnipeg. Curious about the walleye fishing since it is connected to Guniseo via a creek/river. Price is pretty decent for that area of MB.http://www.bennettlakelodge.com Thanks, Brett
Looks like fun to me very affordable place,but sitting at home all winter any place but home looks like fun,rod
Brett does that price include the float plane?

It does but I am not clear on what departure city. There is an option just North of Winnipeg and another one 3 hours north off Lake Winnipeg...that I know of. It is one of many questions a call to the outfitter would answer, but I was hoping to hear anything about the fishing first.The real appeal to me is the location with the connection to Guniseo and the larger walleyes in that lake. I would think the genetic freaks in Guniseo would cross over to this lake. The price is comparable to regular ON outposts.Brett
Not sure if those big eyes from gunisao can make it all the way to Bennett lake,wait and see if anyone chimes in on this place
